description:
Over 1300 students have already signed up and PIMPED up their Fonts - Join them!

  • This course also includes over 1000 cool new fonts that you can install and use on your PC or Mac straight away. Yeeeeeah we have hooked you up! :-)

Whether you are a Student, Teacher, Parent, or Graphic designer, We all make use of applications that use fonts every single day. but most people don't even realise that they are able to easily add cool new fonts to their system which can then be used just as any standard font can....

... This course will open your eyes to the wonderful world of quirky fonts that will get your work noticed and make your graphics & projects POP!

Do NOT settle for the standard fonts that ship with your computer or Mac! Most people go for years (if ever) without upgrading their fonts or obtaining new fonts to use on their system.

Did you know that you don't have to?? ......

The standard Times New Roman, Verdana etc are OK but extremely BORING!.......

This course is all about teaching you all you need to know in order to power Up your Mac or PC. You could have dozens or even hundreds of new fonts to use across ALL your computer applications such as Mi

Here is what you will learn:

  • How and where to download and obtain cool new fonts to use
  • How to install and make use of your new fonts
  • inside you will be able to claim 500 cool fonts that you can download and install

Remember that there is absolutely NO risk to you. You are covered by the rock solid Udemy No quibble Money Back Guarantee for a full 30 days. If the course does not teach you exactly what it promises to then simply request a refund, It's as simple as that!
title: Produce Awesome Work - Upgrade the Fonts on your PC or Mac
